Ok Torbax, since u contacted me ( :D ), are u sure u followed these instructions i posted earlier?
u gotta press 'home' when ur in the menu if the gfwl doesn't open itself and choose don't participate etc.
when u reach "Create New Profile", click it. after that, scroll down and u'll see a link to create local profile. that's where u wanna click. rest is self-explanatory. those fckers at M$ try to hide that option. only posting this i've seen ppl around who can't figure out saving.
so on additional note, u won't be asked for a key unless u're trying to create an online live acc. so that's where teh fail is on ur part.

Hi guys,

I has discovered a solution to my own problem! It has to do with the .bik movies playing very very slow sometimes minutes...just disable the problematic .bik movies by renaming them to .txt for example rename waterfall.bik to waterfall.txt that disables the background video so you can now access the menu, without extreme lag making the pause menu like ''quit to windows'' exessible.
So now it plays flawlessly on a computer with 1 gig of ram and a 3850 AGP video card lol!!

edit; even computers with 3gigs of ram are reporting this problem. usually people with with windows xp professional 32bit. like me..basicly you have to rename all the plasmid videos, the vending machine vid and a couple more.

Ok, got it working. I deleted all the files in the "games" folder where the game is installed and opend my 'NIS2010" and selected this folder as "exmentions for scans and etc" and kept the Sonar Protection "OFF", then installed game. Again while installing the install window hangsup without progress, I had to open the taskmanager and selected the "fsbreb.exe" and ended its process then the installation process resumed.

 No problems for now I launched the game and playing in Dx10, without freeze. I will let U know if there is any crashes and freezes.
